Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller

Class PreGameSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller.PreGameSceneController
public class PreGameSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
This class handle the choose of the Cards and the choose of the first player, loading all the cards and the player dynamically.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox cardChoice_VBox1
    VBox containing the ImageView of the first God, the Name and the description, not visible by default.

    VBox containing the ImageView of the second God, the Name and the description, not visible by default.

  • Field Details

    • gui

      private GUI gui
      Main GUI object.

    • MAX_CARDS_NUMBERS

      public static final double MAX_CARDS_NUMBERS
      Define the Max Number of card to show on the screen. To increase the number of cards, please update this value and create new cards in the FXML file.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • challengerUsername

      private java.lang.String challengerUsername
      The username of the challenger.

    • STATE

      private java.lang.String STATE
      It represents the actual state of the prematch for this player. The possibles STATES are: - CARD_CHOICE - CHALLENGER_CARDS_CHOICE - FIRST_PLAYER_CHOICE - WAIT_CHALLENGER_CARDS - WAIT_PLAYER_CARD - WAIT_FIRST_PLAYER

    • extWaitHBox

      Send the event with the First Player selected by the Challenger

    • fillFirstFreeHBox

      private void fillFirstFreeHBox​(CardEnum card)
      Fill with Card Info the first free HBox. It uses the indexFirstFreeHBox value to find the first free.
      Parameters:
      card - Card to fill

    • fillFirstFreeHBox

      private void fillFirstFreeHBox​(java.lang.String name)
      Fill with Name Info the first free HBox. It uses the indexFirstFreeHBox value to find the first free.
      Parameters:
      name - Username to fill

    • fillFirstFreeHBox

      private void fillFirstFreeHBox​(CardEnum card, java.lang.String bigText, java.lang.String smallText)
      Fill with selected first player info. It uses the indexFirstFreeHBox value to find the first free.
      Parameters:
      card - Card to get the Image
      bigText - Big text, usually is the Player's username or the Card Name
      smallText - If set it's use like card description, if is void ("") it's not used

    • resetIndexFreeHBox

      private void resetIndexFreeHBox()
      Search the first Free HBox and set the value of the index.
